items.summary: Update the Admin dashboard top summary area to match the uploaded screenshot: render the 3 summary items (Total Work/Total Taken/Total Due) as large circular buttons in a single row that spans the full available screen width, with consistent spacing and clear icon/label/value layout inside each circle.

Group the next 3 money-related Admin grid buttons (Payment/Loan, Company Report, Final Balance) inside a single full-width bordered container (one border surrounding all three), while keeping the individual button design consistent with the screenshot (same tile look, rounded corners, shadows).

Ensure any UI element intended to be circular in the Admin dashboard (especially the top 3 circles) is perfectly round across devices (no oval distortion), including correct aspect ratio, centered content alignment, and consistent border thickness.
